2002420.name: Caddywack
2002420.description:
Overview:

Caddywack is an arcade open-world driving game where you pick up passengers, race through city districts, and chain skate-style jumps, drifts, and aerial tricks into combo multipliers across a compact sandbox built for fast, skill-based score chasing.

Design:

Caddywack blends arcade driving, taxi missions, and trick-based combo scoring inside a dense open world designed for flow. Players accept passenger jobs, choose their own routes, drift through tight streets, launch off ramps, perform aerial and wall-based tricks, and maintain momentum to extend combo multipliers while racing against the clock. The core appeal centers on responsive controls, boost-driven speed, route optimization, and replayable high-score mastery, combining the freedom of open-world driving with the expressive trick chaining of skate-inspired arcade games.
